parameters.name: ComputeResource
parameters.description: The compute engine used at runtime. If not specified, the data source defined in the Spec is used.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Hooks
parameters.description: The Hook configurations after the data quality monitoring run ends.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The ID of the user who owns of the data quality monitor.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The definition of execution parameters for the data quality monitoring.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the DataWorks console and go to the workspace configuration page to obtain the workspace ID. This parameter is required to specify the target DataWorks workspace for this API operation.

parameters.name: RuntimeResource
parameters.description: The resource group used during execution of the data quality monitoring.

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description: Spec code for the content of the data quality monitoring.

parameters.name: Trigger
parameters.description: The trigger configurations of the data quality monitoring task.
